name: Xen Speech Recognition Test for Oculus Quest
name_original: Xen Speech Recognition Test for Oculus Quest
description:
This is NOT a game. It's just 1 single scene with a 3D alien character that you can interact with using a menu like Fallout 3. The menu shows a number of options that you can select to respond. You can select with a beam from your hand control OR you can just say the selection and the built in speech recognition will figure out what option you're chosen. 

This is a test to see if I could make a character that felt a little more real in VR.

Oculus does not include the speech recognition libraries in their OS so this project uses a light weight, embedded speech recognizer.

The speech recognition is on-board the device so there will be a bit of lag on the Quest 1 as opposed to the Quest 2. Right now, you can only interact with one character but it would be easy to add more interaction.
